name: Colorful Chaos in the Factory
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 in 5 days

Welcome to Colerful Chaos in the Factory! This is a game about combining colors, and automate the production of diffrent colors!
You are under time pressure though, and new orders come all the time!

So grab some primary collors from spawners like this one... ... crush them in a combiner to create new colors... ... and send them of to fullfill the orders in time! And there's so much more to it!

And now go check it out!

There is an ingame tutorial, please read it trough, because without that... let's just say its a complicated game! :)
